name: Gebockers
overview: Hyper 3D Taisen Battle Gebockers is a simplistic 3D shooting game. You choose one out of a cast of several cartoon characters to duel the others one by one in a 3D environment. The goal is simply to diminish your opponents health by using your standard and special weapons. This was the first Saturn game to be compatible with the Taisen Cable, which could also be bought bundled with the game.
